description: nose plugin for easy testing of django projects and apps. Sets up a test database (or schema) and installs apps from test settings file before tests are run, and tears the test database (or schema) down after all tests are run.
longdescription: nose plugin for easy testing of django projects and apps. Sets up a test database (or schema) and installs apps from test settings file before tests are run, and tears the test database (or schema) down after all tests are run.
